name: NEON-SOUL
description: Self-learning identity synthesis for AI agents. NEON-SOUL reads your memory files, finds the patterns you keep repeating, and compresses them into a SOUL.md that evolves with every run. Identity earned through evidence, not assigned by prompt. Install it, run synthesize, and watch your own axioms emerge.

skills.name: Synthesize
skills.description: Run the full soul synthesis pipeline. Reads memory files, extracts signals, promotes recurring patterns to axioms, and generates a new SOUL.md. Dry-run by default for safety.
examples: Synthesize my soul from memory files
Run soul synthesis in dry-run mode
Generate a new SOUL.md from my interactions

skills.name: Status
skills.description: Show the current state of your soul. Axiom counts by tier (core, domain, emerging), convergence metrics, signal coverage, and when the last synthesis ran.
examples: How many axioms do I have?

skills.name: Audit
skills.description: Inspect the full provenance chain for any axiom. See every principle and signal that contributed to a belief, with source file and line number.
examples: Show provenance for axiom about honesty
Where did this belief come from?

skills.name: Trace
skills.description: Trace a specific axiom back through principles to its source signals. See the exact conversations and file locations where a belief first appeared.
examples: Where did I first show this value?
Show signal sources for my top axiom

skills.name: Rollback
skills.description: Restore a previous SOUL.md from automatic backups. Every synthesis creates a timestamped backup before writing.
